name: CamelCase style variable name. Attempt number 2
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-4-task-6.png)

Need to create a variable without assigning a value to it, using the keyword `let`,
which will store the color of the right border of the element.
Correct the variable name so that the name is written in `camelCase` style.
